DOC.brief_summary: On February 2004 , law ( n. 40/2004 ) regulating assist reproduction technique ( ARTs ) approve Italy . This law aim regulate treatment infertility Italy , contain several restriction , prohibition fertilize three oocyte obligation transfer simultaneously embryos obtain . Several evidence show outcome in-vitro fertilization ( IVF ) techniques strongly correlate quality transfer embryo ( choose right embryo ) . Furthermore , prerequisite actually illegal Italy , optimal oocyte selection consider one crucial factor determine outcome IVF cycle ( choose right oocyte ) . Experimental data demonstrate perifollicular blood flow assessment good marker oocyte competence , embryo viability , implantation potential , subsequent pregnancy rate . The purpose study evaluate clinical set whether assessment perifollicular vascularity feasible useful procedure selection oocytes best developmental potential IVF program limit number oocyte fertilize .
DOC.detailed_description: One hundred fourteen woman tubal factor unexplained infertility undergo IVF program department enrol wild protocol . Successively , enrol patient divide two different sub-protocols evaluate role perifollicular vascularity good- poor-prognosis patient . The diagnosis establish hysterosalpingography and/or laparoscopic dye test partner ’ semen analysis . All patient randomly allocate two independent group ( experimental control group ) use computer-software , random allocation sequence conceal close dark envelope intervention assign . In experimental group alone , power Doppler assessment perifollicular vascularity perform day oocyte retrieval ( 36 h hCG injection ) . The vascularity ovulatory follicle successively study use advanced image analysis software extension grade use well validate grading system . The periovulatory follicle categorize high-grade ( grades 3-4 ) low-grade ( grades 1-2 ) . After patient ’ sedation IV propofol , oocytes retrieve use 17 G double-lumen aspiration needle low pressure individually culture mark test-tube , successively , culture plate code correspond perifollicular vascularity degree . The retrieved oocyte wash mature oocyte , determine presence first polar body ( metaphase II ; MII oocytes ) , classify experienced biologist initially blind previous perifollicular vascularization . In particular , MII oocytes grade three group accord number anomaly : grade I , oocytes without anomaly ; grade II , oocytes one anomaly ; grade III , oocytes least two anomaly . The three oocyte high grade consider “ best ” oocytes fertilize control group , whereas experimental group select integrate morphological ultrasonographic criterion . In particular , embryologist use ultrasonographic criterion choice within oocyte similar morphologic degree . In group , three MII oocyte inseminate 4 h recovery 10000-20000 motile sperm place CO2 incubator temperature 37°C 5 % CO2 air , fertilization evaluate 18 h later confirm presence two pronucleus two polar body . The fertilized oocyte classify well standardize score system zygote culture total 48 h oocyte IVF . Before transfer , cleavage embryo grade accord embryo morphology relative proportion anucleate fragment present zona pellucida . All embryo , exclusion arrest ( cleaved 24 h IVF ) , replace patient without ultrasonographic guidance use ultrasoft Frydman catheter . The luteal phase support 100 mg natural progesterone daily administrate . A serum β-hCG assessment perform 15th day embryos transfer . For cycle , serum estradiol level number dominant follicle day hCG administration , duration ovarian stimulation , unit r-FSH administer record . The concordance ultrasonographic grade score oocyte degree also evaluate case . Cancelled cycle ( case absence follicular response 35 day treatment serum E2 value > 2500 pg/ml ) , fertilization ( percentage fertilize oocyte / total oocyte ) , implantation ( percentage intra-uterine gestational sac / total transfer embryo ) , clinical ( percentage rise β-hCG sonographic evidence intrauterine gestational sac fetal cardiac activity 7 week pregnancy / total non-cancelled cycle ) ongoing ( percentage vital pregnancy confirm ultrasonography 12 week gestational age / total non-cancelled cycle ) pregnancy rate evaluate patient . The number multiple pregnancy ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) also record group .
